member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.TestIntegration.Client.ITestIntegrationService
M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.TestIntegration.Client.ITestIntegrationService.SyncCapability(System.Uri)
member.summary:
Synchronizes the testing capability on a lab environment
The synchronization involves making sure that the testing capability is completely in sync with the configuration metadata stored in the lab environment.
If testing capability is not configured on a lab environment, then synchronization will involve removing the environment from test management components, if it not already removed.
member.param: A Uri that uniquely identifies a lab environment
member.exception: thrown if object is locked for another operation
thrown when service fails to communicate with controller.
thrown when environment is not in valid state.
thrown if some error occured while processing request

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.TestIntegration.Client.ITestIntegrationService.SyncCapability(System.Uri,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Synchronizes the testing capability and/or lab service account on a lab environment
The synchronization involves making sure that the testing capability is completely in sync with the testing configurations stored in the lab environment. If is true, then only the lab service account is updated on the lab environment and synchronization of the testing capability is skipped.
If testing capability is not configured on a lab environment, then synchronization will involve removing the environment from test management components, if it not already removed.
member.param: A Uri that uniquely identifies a lab environment
Indicates whether to update only lab service account
member.exception: thrown if object is locked for another operation
thrown when service fails to communicate with controller.
thrown when environment is not in valid state.
thrown if some error occured while processing request

member.summary: Returns the status of testing capability on a lab environment
member.param: A Uri that uniquely identifies a lab environment
member.exception: thrown when service fails to communicate with controller.
thrown if some error occured while processing request

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.TestIntegration.Client.TestRigHelper.GetCollectionUriString(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.TestIntegration.Client.ITestIntegrationService)
member.summary:
Get the Collection URI for the parameter labService.
It will return url of format: - http://machine:port/CollectionName

members.member: Returns a localized string given a resource string name.
Returns a localized integer given a resource string name.
Returns a localized string given a resource string name.

A little helper function to alleviate some typing associated with loading resources and formatting the strings. In DEBUG builds, it also asserts that the number of format arguments and the length of args match.
